thread.title: BlackRock says it sees opportunity to take on more market risk

title: BlackRock says it sees opportunity to take on more market risk
text:
February 6, 2018 / 9:30 PM / in 15 minutes BlackRock says it sees opportunity to take on more market risk Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
NEW YORK (Reuters) - BlackRock Inc’s ( BLK.N ) Investment Institute said on Tuesday that the swoon in stock markets is “contained” and that it sees an opportunity to take on more risk, particularly in emerging market equities. 
A real change in markets would require a deterioration in the economy, the group said in a note. Instead, the recent pullback “appeared to stem from investor jitters over the stock market run-up, record equity inflows and rapidly increasing interest rates,” exacerbated by products betting against rising U.S. equity volatility, BlackRock said. Reporting by Trevor Hunnicutt; Editing by Leslie Adler
